# Single select icon



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

The single select icon component is a component that displays the selected value icon of a single select component.

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                         | Type  | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------------------- | ----- | ----------- |
| `value`  | `value`   | Defines the value of the component. | `any` | `undefined` |


## Slots

| Slot | Description                                      |
| ---- | ------------------------------------------------ |
|      | The default slot where the content is displayed. |
